resources.string: Zaba sai ka jawo don ka daidaita
Dauki hoton abun da ke motsawa gabaɗaya akan allo.
Abun ku na iya yin wasan ski, kwando, rawa, ko kuma tafiya kawai.
"Za'a ''zabi'' su firem din hoto da aka daskare yayin da bidiyo ke yi."
Wannan filta mai kala yana riƙe da launuka rawaya da shuɗi mai duhu kawai. Yi amfani da shi a kan tituna masu haske sosai na garin dare.
Tsarin launi wanda aka saba amfani dashi a cikin fina-finai yana ƙara kore zuwa yankuna masu duhu. Wannan filtan tana aiki sosai ma babban kala da suka bambanta sosai kamar maraice a cikin gari.
"Haɗuwa da babban kala da jikewa yana haifar da ƙarancin sha'awa da son kai."
Wannan haɗin launuka na musamman yana aiki daidai a cikin yanayi na girgije da haske mai laushi.
Sautunan duhu da kala mai laushi sun dace da shimfidar fage na cikin gida.
Sautunan launin ruwan kasa da matsakaiciyar kala suna haifar da yanayi mai dumi don daukar hoto na fage a waje yanayin fitila na asali.
Babban kala da ƙananan jikewa zai kawo jin daɗin sinima a mafi yawan fage.
Dabarar fim ta gargajiya wacce take sanya yankuna masu duhu sanyi da haske. Wannan filta zata sabunta dajin birane da waje mai kyau.
"Sa batun a cikin firem kuma ka bar na'urar aƙalla nisa da mita %d"
"Matsa da na'urar daga abin ka koyaushe"
"Kun matsa da na'urar nisa da yawa. Sake farawa."
Tabbatar cewa akwai isasshen sarari tsakanin abun da bangon.
Yi ƙoƙarin guje wa manyan yankuna masu launi mai karfi.
Tambayi abun ka kada ya motsa.
Ka tuna ka riƙe abun a cikin firem yayin dauka.
"Matsa da na'urar daga abin ka koyaushe."
Za a iya rikodin lokacin bidiyon daskarewa lokaci a fuskantarwa yanayin ƙasa
包含运动追焦和手动追焦，开启后系统会自动识别人和宠物进行追焦，也可以双击选定任意目标追焦
"Yi rikodin sauti ta hanyar makirufo na waje lokacin da aka haɗa na'urar ji na Bluetooth mai ɗauke da makurofon"
"Kunna rikodin sauti a cikin na'urar kai idan an haɗa su"
Rage amo a cikin bidiyo dangane da yanayin
Rage tasirin iska akan rikodin sauti
Tace sautuna daga bayan allo yayin yin rikodi
Bi abubuwa masu motsi cikin yanayin rage fitila.
Gwada sannu a hankali a cikin fage daban-daban.
Wannan yanayin yana aiki da kyau tare da mutane masu gudana da abubuwan hawa masu motsi.
Kuma ka bar abun ka a bayyane.
Kuna iya daskarewa da cire daskara bango a kowane lokaci kafin ko yayin dauka.
Tambayi abun ku ya zauna a tsakiyar firem.
Dakatar da abubuwa a cikin iska.
Wannan filta na ganauna nuna mutane a launi, suna yin bango fari da baki.
Launuka masu laushi sun sake sabon salo na kallon fina-finai wanda aka ɗauka akan fim.
Karamin jikewa da kala suna kawo wasu bakaken noordik zuwa yanayin cikin gida mai laushi da haske.
Monochrome mai dumi yana aiki don mafi yawan fage.
Kanana kala da sautunan haske suna aiki da kyau lokacin da kake buƙatar kiyaye launin fata. Wannan filta ta dace da yanayin rana na waje.
